wikitext.*:
'''''tal''''' (unattested plural ''tail'') means "foot" or "end" in [[Sindarin]]. The word is rendered ''dal'' with [[lenition]] (lenited plural form ''dail'').<ref name=S>{{S|Appendix}}</ref><ref>{{WJ|AB}}, p. 388</ref><ref>[[Didier Willis]], [http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/english.html Hiswelókë's Sindarin Dictionary] at [http://www.jrrvf.com/haut.shtml Jrrvf.com] (accessed 19 June 2011)</ref>

==Compounds==
*''[[Celebrindal]]'' ("silver-foot")
*''[[Labadal]]'' ("Hopafoot")<ref>{{CH|1}}, p. 41</ref>
*''[[Ramdal]]''
*''[[Petty-dwarves|Levain tad-dail]]''
